thread.title: Summer Stage Concert Series Featuring Yacht Rock Schooner in Duluth
thread.title_full: Summer Stage Concert Series Featuring Yacht Rock Schooner in Duluth

author: City of Duluth
title: Summer Stage Concert Series Featuring Yacht Rock Schooner in Duluth
text: Receive press releases from City of Duluth: By Email RSS Feeds: Summer Stage Concert Series Featuring Yacht Rock Schooner in Duluth Duluth, GA, August 05, 2015 --( PR.com )-- The City of Duluth will host their 3rd Summer Stage Concert for the year. Yacht Rock Schooner will hit the stage in a spellbinding performance. Residents can enjoy the smooth sounds of the late '70s and early '80s.“Residents can expect to dance the night away and have a great time as Yacht Rock Schooner throws a party that spans across generations,” said Event Coordinator Maggie Waddell.The band is comprised of some of Atlanta's top players with a dual keyboard setup, multiple ace vocalists and a sax man. Yacht Rock Schooner will perform on August 15th from 8-10 p.m. on Duluth Town Green. There will be giant games, food and beverage vendors. VIP tables are available for purchase.The Summer Stage Concert season will wrap up with The Duluth Fall Festival presenting Rupert’s Orchestra in concert on September 12th from 7-10pm. Residents can put on their dancing shoes when this dynamic band hits the stage.This is an open zone event, so you may bring your own drink or purchase from our licensed vendors. Grab a drink, your friends and family and experience downtown Duluth. Contact Information
